content.text:
# Canadian Radio Music Awards

The Canadian Radio Music Awards is an annual series of awards presented by the Canadian Association of Broadcasters that was part of Canadian Music Week.- -  The award show began in 1998.
2016
Complete list of 2016 Canadian Radio Music Awards winners
{| class="wikitable" style="width:50%"
|-
! style="width:50%"  | Best New Group or Solo Artist: CHR
| valign="top"  |
* Alessia Cara
! style="width:50%" | Best New Group or Solo Artist: AC
| valign="top"  |
* Scott Helman
|-

| valign="top"  |
* The Standstills
! style="width:50%" | Best New Group or Solo Artist: Modern Rock
| valign="top"  |
* Coleman Hell
|-
! style="width:50%"  | Best New Group or Solo Artist: Country
| valign="top"  |
* Cold Creek County
! style="width:50%" | SOCAN Song Of The Year
| valign="top"  |
* '''Can't Feel My Face, By: The Weeknd
|-
! style="width:50%"  | Chart Topper Award
| valign="top"  |
* Shawn Mendes
! style="width:50%" | Fan Choice
| valign="top"  |
* The Weeknd
|-
! style="width:50%"  | Heatseeker Award
| valign="top"  |
* The Strumbellas
! style="width:50%" | FACTOR Breakthrough Artist Award
| valign="top"  |
* Leah Daniels
|}
